eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.ranking

Class PartialRandomAccessRanking<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.ranking.PartialRandomAccessRanking<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRankAggregator

    public class PartialRandomAccessRanking<K,V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRankAggregator
    Implementation of a variant rank aggregation algorithm using random access to partially available look-ups obtained by each similarity search query..

    • Constructor Detail

      • PartialRandomAccessRanking

        public PartialRandomAccessRanking(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,DatasetIdentifier> datasetIdentifiers,
                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<K,V>> lookups,
                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,ISimilarity> similarities,
                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double[]> weights,
                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,INormal> normalizations,
                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Thread> tasks,
                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue<PartialResult>> queues,
                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean> runControl,
                                  int topk,
                                  Logger log)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        datasetIdentifiers - List of the attributes involved in similarity search queries.
        lookups - Look-up tables for attributes involved in the similarity search.
        similarities - List of the similarity measures applied in each search query.
        weights - List of the weights to be applied in similarity scores returned by each search query.
        normalizations - List of normalization functions to be applied in data values during random access.
        tasks - The list of running threads; each one executes a query and it is associated with its respective queue that collects its results.
        queues - The list of the queues collecting results from each search query.
        runControl - The list of boolean values indicating the status of each thread.
        topk - The count of ranked aggregated results to collect, i.e., those with the top-k (highest) aggregated similarity scores.
        log - Handle to the log file for notifications and execution statistics.

    • Method Detail

      • fetchPartialResult

        private PartialResult fetchPartialResult(java.lang.String taskKey)
        Provides the next partial result from a queue. Results already examined due to random access are skipped.
        Parameters:
        taskKey - The hashKey of the task to be checked for its next result.
        Returns:
        A partial result from this queue to be used in rank aggregation.

      • updateRankedList

        private boolean updateRankedList(java.lang.String taskKey)
        Inserts or updates the ranked aggregated results based on a result from the i-the queue.
        Parameters:
        taskKey - The hashKey of the task (associated with a priority queue) to be checked for its next result.
        Returns:
        True, if the ranked aggregated list has been updated; otherwise, False.

      • updateBounds

        private void updateBounds(AggregateResult res,
                          int w)
        Updates bounds regarding the score of a query result by randomly accessing any attribute values available in the partial lookups.
        Parameters:
        res - The ranked candidate result.
        w - The identifier of the weight combination to be applied on the scores.

      • proc

        public RankedResult[][] proc()
        Implements the logic of the Partial Random Access algorithm.
        Specified by:
        proc in interface IRankAggregator
        Returns:
        Array of the aggregated top-k results.

      • reportExtraResultsUB

        private void reportExtraResultsUB()
        Complement top-k final results by picking extra items with descending UPPER bounds on their aggregate scores.

      • reportExtraResultsLB

        private void reportExtraResultsLB()
        Complement top-k final results by picking extra items with descending LOWER bounds on their aggregate scores.

      • reportExtraResultsMB

        private void reportExtraResultsMB()
        Complement top-k final results by picking extra items with descending AVERAGE bounds on their aggregate scores.

      • issueRankedResult

        private void issueRankedResult(int i,
                               int w,
                               java.lang.String item,
                               double score)
        Inserts the i-th ranked result to the output list. Rank is based on the overall score; ties in scores are resolved arbitrarily.
        Parameters:
        w - The identifier of the weight combination to be applied on the scores.
        item - The original identifier of this item in the dataset
        rank - The rank of this result in the output list.
        score - The overall (weighted) score of this result.
